item.title: Designer Babies: The Ethical Dilemma with Gene Editing
item.description: Gene editing is the process of changing and altering the genetic code of different organisms. The applications for gene editing are vastâ€¦ from modifying plants so they have a longer shelf life to fighting genetic diseases, gene editing can do a lot. Even though breakthroughs in gene editing will change the world, should we allow it to? Gene editing has some major drawbacks when you put an ethical lens on it, and in this article Iâ€™ll go over some of the main arguments.
